languages.text: {n}Вздернув подбородок, Инцендия высокомерно отвечает:{/n} "Это и есть истинное правосудие. Беспристрастное, неизбежное и равно беспощадное ко всем".
{n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."
languages.original_text: {n}Вздернув подбородок, Инцендия высокомерно отвечает:{/n} "Это и есть истинное правосудие. Беспристрастное, неизбежное и равно беспощадное ко всем".

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅扬起下巴，傲慢地回应道。{/n}“这才是真正的正义。没有偏见，无人能逃，对所有人都同样无情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅扬起下巴，傲慢地回应道。{/n}“这才是真正的正义。没有偏见，无人能逃，对所有人都同样无情。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは顎を引き、傲然とした態度で答えた。{/n}「これこそが真の正義。偏見なく、回避不可能、そして誰に対しても同様に無慈悲だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは顎を引き、傲然とした態度で答えた。{/n}「これこそが真の正義。偏見なく、回避不可能、そして誰に対しても同様に無慈悲だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia levanta la barbilla y responde altivamente.{/n} «Esto ES justicia de verdad. Imparcial, ineludible e igual de despiadada para todos».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia levanta la barbilla y responde altivamente.{/n} «Esto ES justicia de verdad. Imparcial, ineludible e igual de despiadada para todos».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia reißt das Kinn hoch und antwortet hochmütig:{/n} "Das IST wahre Gerechtigkeit. Vorurteilsfrei, unausweichlich und jedem gegenüber gleichermaßen gnadenlos."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia reißt das Kinn hoch und antwortet hochmütig:{/n} "Das IST wahre Gerechtigkeit. Vorurteilsfrei, unausweichlich und jedem gegenüber gleichermaßen gnadenlos."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia lève le menton et vous répond sur un ton hautain :{/n} « C'est la vraie justice, celle qui s'applique à tous sans discrimination. Impartiale, inéluctable et impitoyable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia lève le menton et vous répond sur un ton hautain :{/n} « C'est la vraie justice, celle qui s'applique à tous sans discrimination. Impartiale, inéluctable et impitoyable. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, başını dikleştirip mağrurca yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Bu, gerçek adalet. Ön yargısız, kaçınılmaz ve herkes için eşit derecede acımasız."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia jerks her chin up and responds haughtily,{/n} "This IS true justice. Unprejudiced, inescapable, and equally merciless to all."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia başını dikleştiriyor ve mağrurca yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Bu, gerçek adalet. Ön yargısız, kaçınılmaz ve herkes için eşit derecede acımasız."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
